data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: The Company had filed an appeal with Commissioner (Appeals) and the Commissioner (Appeals) vide his latest Order had ruled the case materially in favour of the Company with a reduced demand of Rs 16.00 lakhs with applicable interest and penalty of Rs 1.06 lakhs. The Oder is yet to be uploaded in the GST Portal by the Office of Commissioner (Appeals) due to technical Challenge. This declaration is made based on Physical copy received .
